questions.question: Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi?
answers: Nayikunze kandi yari ngira kamaro
Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe n'iyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

questions.question: Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi?
answers: Gutatura impari n' amatati
Gukorera mu runani rwiza
kugenzura inyiyumvo zawe

questions.question: Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure kuvuga, kwibuka no kwerekana ibishobisho bitandukanye
Gufasha abanyeshure kumenya ko abagenzi babo bafitaniye ivyo bahuriyeko n'ubudasa
Gufasha abanyeshure kwigabura mu mugwi, kwumvirizanya no gusangira ivyiyumviro n'abandi

questions.question: Ni ibiki imigwi y'abanyeshure bategerezwa gukorera mu runani?
answers: Kwiyumvira ku nzira zo gutatura amatati
Kwerekana uruhara rwa buri muntu canke ibihimba
Kwiga kwererekana ibishobisho ukoresheje ibimenyetso vyo mu maso

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa gutera intege abanyeshure bose mu mashine mu gusigura ibikorwa vyabo
Notegerezwa guhitamwo gusa imigwi mu gusabikanya ivyiza muri aka gakorwa
Notegerezwa kwemerera abanyeshure bamwe bamwe kwigira inyuma no kutaba mu bigze imashine

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa guha amahirwe imigwi yabikoze neza
Notegerezwa gutanga uburorero mu gihe abanyeshure badashoboye kwiyumvira ku mashine canke badashoboye kwiyumvira ukwikora
Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure ibikora imashine .

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu utotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure uko ibikorwa vyose bigenda
Notegerezwa guhitamwo umugwi urya nyene mu gusabikanya buri mwanya twimenyereje akagakorwa
Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure uko vyagenze ku bijanye nuko bakoreye mu runani gwiza canke ivyo botegerezwa gukorera hamwe neza muri kazoza

questions.question: . Ni akahe karore k'ikibazo wotegerezwa kubaza abanyeshure mu kiganiro c'aka gakorwa?(hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye
answers: Ni gute amatati yoshobora gukingwa?
Ni gute mwahisemwo uruhara rw'umwe umwe muri mwebwe rw'ico ategerezwa gukina ku mashine?
Ni ibihe mwize ku bijanye n'umubiri wacu n'inyiyumvo zacu muri aka gakorwa?

questions.question: Ni ibiki wotegerezwa gufasha abanyeshure muri aka gakorwa?
answers: Abanyeshure bategerezwa kuyaga ukuntu iyo nyifato yabateye kwiyumva
Abanyeshure bategerezwa kwiyemeza mu kiganiro ico bubaka n'ico umuntu wese ategerezwa gukora batarinze kubifashwamwo n'umwigisha
Abanyeshure bategerezwa guhumiriza amaso yabo no guheme bashikana mu gihe c'agakorwa
